title: One Day Soon
creator_contributor_role: Australian College of Entertainers, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped
description: A production that shows how handicapped people can live independent lives and how they cope with their unique situation. This video has won the Television Society Penguin Award and the Mobile Award.
